Text: Eliminate the imperials
Defeat the magitek scorpion
Eliminate all obstacles
Slay Aulus mal Asina
Arrive in the Hall of the Griffin
Recording subject's performance...
I shall have to share these findings...
Initiate soul extraction!
Hah! Success!
The soul rebels!?
Impossible...incredible!

Like a moth to the flame...
But why else would you come, if not for this?
Show me your all...
Have you the strength?
The power...to transcend...
Let this moment last forever...
My word, this data...
How glorious the violence within you...
Reach the Deltascape
Clear Point II
Clear Point III
Take the lead, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. We'll follow.
No good. It's protected by some kind of barrier.
Ooh, barriers are my specialty! I'll have this down before you know it!
Chief, something's happening with the cube!
Oho, so it changes into a life-form, and a hostile one at that.
We'll see to the creature! Wedge, keep at the barrier! Biggs, watch his back!
Another one! It seems they'll continue spawning so long as the monitor is operational.
Hah, it's out of commission! The trick is to reverse the barrier's energy current!
Well done, Wedge! That leaves just the enemy!
Chief, the second cube's about to turn!
Let's finish it quickly and be on our way.
Right, the same approach as before. Wedge and Biggs, the monitor is yours.
The rest of us will tend to the enemy. Whenever you're ready, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>.
Be careful! The cubes are going to turn!
Damn, they're spawning fast! Hurry, Wedge!
Another monitor down and out! Am I in form today or what!?
That you are, Wedge! Now, give us a moment while we clean things up.
Biggs, this time you get a monitor as well. <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, you know what to do.
Hmph, I should think I'm no less qualified to tinker with these toys.
Have care. I sense a formidable presence.
A behemoth!? We're going to have to roll up our sleeves!
Never one for half measures...eh, Omega?
Haha, yes! My monitor's down!
Mine too! That should take care of the cubes!
Great work, you two! <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, Nero─just a little further!
Godsdammit... I messed up...
Gah... I was out of my depth...
Nooo... Still so much to do...
My luck's run out... You'll have to manage without my wit...
Not even mine avatar is safe... I take my leave of thee, mortal.
Grrraaarrrghhh! You no like ground? I make you fly!
There is no escape. You shall be a pawn in my games unto death.
There is no escape. You shall be a pawn in my grand games unto death.
Let the board be changed!
That concludes the first round. Let the board be changed!
You've done well to survive the second round. But how will you fare in the next?
Well, well, aren't you durable? But it's only a matter of time before you crumble.
Four rounds over yet you still stand!? You clearly want for a challenge, and I shall give it to you!
For a change of pace, let us play...an escape game!
While you partake of the game, I shall partake of afternoon tea.
A starry gift comes for you, but you'll not wish to be around to receive it.
Escape swiftly, and you may well earn a prize.
Well, well, returned before I could drain my cup. You deserve a prize.
Hmph, I have long drained my cup. Such insolence to keep a lady waiting.
Afternoon tea is over. Let us resume our fun-filled games.
Dance is art in motion, and no one dances more artfully than I!
My dance brings the board to life!
My dance holds all in its thrall!
Let us add a special touch to the board. Oh, there's naught to fear...as long as you obey the rules.
Yes, you need but abide by the symbols. A simple game, yes?
How can you not grasp such a simple game? Are you failing on purpose?
Mayhap that was too easy. But benevolent as I am, I shall grant you a prize nonetheless.
Now then, let us increase the challenge with a delightful picture game!
What's the matter? If you do not abide by the symbols, there <Italic>1</Italic>will<Italic>0</Italic> be a penalty.
Come now, it really isn't all that hard. Surely you can do better.
Well, aren't we a natural at this? This calls for a prize!
I grow weary of this game. Mayhap I'll spice things up with a pinch of desperation.
Look upon these symbols. You will find them familiar.
A shield to block, a sword to strike, a cross to heal. Choose wisely, or pay the price!
Good, you understand the rules. You're clever. I like clever people.
And how about this pattern? What is the right answer?
Those who choose poorly will be duly punished!
Ah, such a sweet chorus, a veritable treat for the ears! A prize is in order!
Now then, let us have a race. Run, run, as fast as you can!
Hahaha... You shall all be given to the void!
Fall!
My magic is steeped in the greatest of powers─the power of the void!
My true strength lies in the void, and in the void all is laid bare!
You will rue provoking me! I shall send you to your doom!
Void devour you!
Nothingness is my weapon, and nothingness alone can strike me down!
Hahaha... Anger and hatred cannot defeat me!
Hahaha... Mine is the ultimate magic!
Hahaha... I shall send you to your doom!
My true strength lies in the void, and in the void all is laid bare!
Th-This cannot be...
Nooo!
Why!?
The void was mine to command!
How could it─ Arrrgh!
I am Neo Exdeath.
All memories...dimensions...existence... All that is shall be returned to nothing.
Then I, too, can disappear...
Forever!
Watch out, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! He's shaking the very foundations of creation!
Arrive at the Green Screams
Defeat Kelpie
Arrive at a Door Unopened
Defeat the Old One
Arrive at the Golden Walls of Ruin

Graaaaaah!
Kill! Kill you all!

\\<snarl> Death!
Death comes for you!

×△AcTivatE△×◎CLUNK◎×▼TRaNsfoRMatiOn▼×
HeX, hEx, HEx, hEX...

×△sACriFicE△×◎WHIR◎×▼sUBserViEntS▼×
BooM, bOOm, BOom, boOm...
Arrive at the Crumbling Bridge
Defeat Mateus, the Corrupt
Arrive in the Palace Square
Defeat Hashmal, Bringer of Order
Arrive in the Garamsythe Waterway
Clear the Garamsythe Waterway
Defeat Rofocale
Arrive at the Lesalia Temple Ruins
Slay Argath Thadalfus
You do not fear me!? You will!
Fools! You have not...yet seen...the limit of my reach...
Without order, creation is doomed to descend into chaos. I bring that order. You <Italic>1</Italic>will<Italic>0</Italic> kneel.
Your order...is a lie...
Hark! What army marches on Rofocale's demesne?
Ah... To die a good death...
It is to be a fight, then? I am only too happy to oblige!
Fool is the dog who bares his teeth before his master!
Like sheep before the wolf!
You are but blood to stain the circle!
The gods have no eyes for chattel!
Kneel and repent!
The world has no place for such wretches. Your claim to life is forfeit!
I am the truth from which you run!
I am the lies upon which you sup!
I am Revelation!
You will be judged!
Does it grieve you to see the depths of your own weakness laid bare? Maggots...
You do not belong in <Italic>1</Italic>my<Italic>0</Italic> world. Step into Nothing!
Sound the battle horns! Soldiers, to me!
The heavens tremble in my wake!
The auracite! Gaze upon its undying brilliance and know true fear!
Hah hah hah hah! Even a hound knows when to turn tail! Would you have us think you less than chattel!?
Ill fortune befall all who dare gaze upon me!
An inescapable hell awaits you all!
Without light, there can be only darkness!
Born of darkness, born of night! Come forth, my children!
To maintain order, one must first have control.
The land seeks order. It will not suffer the chaos you peddle. Nor will I!
Why do you resist!?
Resistance will be met with retribution! The land shall bury your screams!
To defy order is to defy creation itself!
Tear them asunder!
Even the laws of life itself are mine to bend! Rise sand! Rise stone! Heed my bidding!
Come! The cleansing flame will seal all wounds!
Rise dark water, and grant me strength!
Goddess of ice, be my blade!
Goddess of ice, be my shield!
Living shield, protect me from evil!
Freeze, dark waters! Steel my body! Steel my resolve!
Let the ichor flow. Let it birth the mire that will drown mine enemies!
Petty creatures! And still you do not fall!
Enough of this! I shall end you now. All of you!
How is this possible? Nothing can withstand the cold! Nothing!
Now, the city shall sleep!
Before us lies the Royal City. My father is somewhere inside. I can feel it.
These are no ordinary birds!
Something foul prevents our crossing. Ware its numbing breath!
Cid was not mistaken in his assessment of your skill in battle. Still, I worry that something even more sinister awaits us ahead.
Seeq bandits! It appears the deplorable creatures are here to raid abandoned homes.
My father mentioned the Empire using their might to put down rebellions within the city, but this destruction is too widespread. What if that creature we fought earlier...
More bandits...despite all the creatures we've encountered? I know not whether they are brave or foolish.
Another of the twisted “others”! This is not the work of the Empire. Something is wrong here.
Again, you have proven your worth to this expedition. Let us see what lies beneath the city.

Welcome to the Garamsythe Waterway. These tunnels are said to have existed since before even the Kingdom of Dalmasca was born. As the city grows, channels are widened, and new outlets dug. I would venture that some of the pools are so deep, no one alive has ever seen their bottoms.
The creatures here are not mere beasts or voidsent. The secrets that lie beyond must be ones worth keeping.
Any doubts I had of your participation in this rescue I have no longer. I was wrong to place mistrust in Cid and my sister's judgment. Now let us continue on. I sense we are close to our goal.
These ruins... We are no longer in Rabanastre, my friends. This is Lesalia. The Lesalia of Ivalician legend!
The air here feels...wrong. Can't you sense it? Death awaits us in yon chamber.
The ice burns hotter than flame! You are branded for life!
Crawl forth from the shadows, my pet!
Pah! You have yet to witness the auracite's true might!
I walk the shadows. You will not see me until my lance has transfixed your very soul!
The tip of my lance is already at your necks. Submit, or die.
The light! It blinds!
Drown in my darkness!
Writhe in the land's embrace!
O Bahamut! We shall stand guard as you make ready your divine judgment!
Ugh... None shall defy Lord Bahamut's will! On your knees, vermin!
10 seconds to Teraflare
5 seconds to Teraflare
4 seconds to Teraflare
3 seconds
2 seconds
1 second
Use Deflect to dissipate the aether spheres!
Defeat Lakshmi!

Leaders of Gyr Abania...
Accept my love. Worship my light!

She means to enthrall everyone...
We have to stop her!
They've done a fine job of blocking our retreat...

We must break through!
Forget the primal and focus on the foe before you!

Why...? I offer you peace and ssserenity...
Sssurrender yourselves to me...

And give up the freedom we've worked so hard to win?
Not likely!

Do not your mortal bodies tire?
Far better to dwell in dream.
We'll keep our eyes open, thanks very much!
I shall free you from your hate.

There are too many...
We can't stop them all!

Why? Why do you deny my blessing!?
You who defy me shall ressst in death!

They brought you into this world over a mistake I made...
And I'll be damned if I let you taunt me with it!
I'll cut us a path. Stand ready!

You cannot flee my radiance.
You will all be my dreamers.

We'll lock her down as best we can.
The rest of you need to run!

I can't. I can't run away from this.
They need us!

...Then we stand and fight together.
Alphinaud, the envoys are in your care!

Surely you do not mean to... Very well.
I shall see our guests to safety.
All of you, to me!

Why are you two staying!?
She still has more than enough strength to addle you both!

You need more than three to best a primal!
And if we let you fall here, then who'll be left to stop her?

Pitiful, misssguided children.
Lay down your weapons, lay down your heads...

Wha─ I can't move!
She's going after Lyse and Raubahn!
Do not your sssouls weigh heavy?

She's building up to something big!
Come close to me, all of you!

Nice work, Fordola!
...Are you all right, though?
\\<huff> This... \\<gasp> ...This is nothing!

Ugh, it's one thing after another...
We have to fight as one!
Why do you cling to your misery?

She's starting to weaken!
Don't give up!
Behold...my divine brilliance!

What in the─? Her power's out of control!
I'll shield us, but you'll have to finish her off!
...Quickly! I can't hold her off forever!
...Kill her! \\<gasp> You need to kill her now!
\\<gasp> I can't... \\<groan> I'm spent...

My thanks, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
I'll make sure my steel is worth the effort!
Again and again you refuse my gift...

Quickly now, while the primal is─
...Lyse!?
Godsdammit! We've failed...

Hold on, Fordola...
We end this now! For Ala Mhigo!
Arrive at Demonsgate
Clear Demonsgate
Arrive in the Furnace
Clear the Furnace
Arrive on the Polished Shell
It would seem a more stringent test is in order!
Overcome the gate or be consumed by my waters!
You were warned, warriors! Survive if you can!
Come, blessed waters, to frolic and flow!
Heh heh, let's see you find me now!
If it's a fight you want, it's a fight you'll get!
Grrraaarrrgh!!!
Arrive at the reality augmentation bay
Defeat the Motherbit
Arrive at exhibit level VIII
Defeat the Ultima Warrior
Arrive at the Genesis Engine

Warning. Warning. Armed intruder detected.
Activating defense systems.

Initiating electrochemical transfer...
Activating drone attack sequence.

Critical error occurred. Unable to continue electro chemical transfer.
Please submit system logs to the Allagan Research Council for analysis.

Automated assistant online... \\<buzzzzzz> \\<buzzzzzz>
Hello there. I see you've activated Ultima Prototype IV.
This humanoid prototype can perfectly replicate eikon abilities. In fact, it's already loading our data on Sephirot.
Utilizing our data on Sophia, we can at last tip the scales in our favor.
Successfully mimicking the Demon Zurvan earned our researchers a patent under article 42─ \\<buzzzzzz>
Its ability to seamlessly switch between sets of data will keep enemies guessing.
Automated assistant offline... Please vacate Exhibit Level VIII. Maintenance will begin shortly.

Automated assistant online... \\<buzzzzzz> \\<buzzzzzz>
Hello again. Oh dear, you've disturbed Ultima Prototype VI.
This prototype is the result of years of research in genetic augmentation. Its preternatural vitality is not to be trifled with.
A number of roborants can also be administered to bolster its strength further, making it the ultimate─ \\<buzzzzzz>
There is no turning back!
Steel yourself!
You're mine!
To ashes with you!
Lightning, sear!
Tempest, surge!
Twofold is my wrath, twice-cursed my foes!
All creation trembles before my might!
Behold fury given form!
My wrath is a ceaseless torrent!
No more games!
Impressive. Very well, I shall bring all to bear!
Roar! Writhe! Rage!
You are stronger than I dared to hope.
Clear the first trial
Clear the second trial
Till Mog Do Us Part
Cards Beat as One
Welcome to the Valentione's Ceremony, kupo.

Here, the pair of you will undertake two trials.
By your performance, we will know your affinity for one another.

First up, “Till Mog Do Us Part.”
The rule is simple: get through the maze, kupo.
Just take care not to stray too far from one another, or your Affinity will weaken!

Next up, “Cards Beat as One.”
Work together to find matching pairs of cards, kupo.
Be warned: picking the wrong cards results in a penalty.
You may begin, kupo!
You may begin, kupo!
You made it, kupo!

That does it for the second trial, kupo!
We've seen all that we need to see!
And now, the moment you've been waiting for...

How well did your bond hold up amid the trials?
All shall be revealed, kupo!

Your affinity can be likened to a rotten kupo nut.
I wouldn't wish it on my worst enemy, kupo.

Your affinity can be likened to an ordinary kupo nut.
It could be better, but I'd still eat it, kupo.

Your affinity can be likened to a plump kupo nut.
It makes you the envy of moogles for malms around!

B-By the heavens, this is nothing short of a miracle!
Were your affinity a kupo nut, it would be the golden kupo nut of myth!
Off you go, kupo! The first trial awaits!
Er, right... Well, you got through the first trial, kupo. That has to count for something.
Well done getting through the first trial, kupo. That wasn't a bad effort, but there's room for improvement.
Well done getting through the first trial, kupo! I must say, that was some impressive teamwork!

Now then, since I'm such a kind moogle,
here's a bit of help to get you started.
Onward, kupo! The second trial awaits!
I'm going to give you a little flash. Don't tell anyone, alright, kupo?
Have yourself a good eyeful before I put them away.
Nice one, kupo! Keep up the good guesswork!
Wow, you didn't make a single mistake! That's incredible, kupo!
Too bad, kupo. You have to focus and work together.
That's all the cards matched. Well done, kupo!

That concludes the Valentione's Ceremony.
We look forward to hosting you again, kupo!

WEAPON SYSTEMS ONLINE...
RUNNING BASIC PROGRAM...
GUARDIAN, ENGAGED.
RUNNING DADALUMA COMBAT PROGRAM...
RUNNING ULTROS COMBAT PROGRAM...
RUNNING AIR FORCE COMBAT PROGRAM...
RUNNING BIBLIOTAPH COMBAT PROGRAM...
RUNNING VIRUS COMBAT PROGRAM...

FLIGHT SYSTEMS ONLINE...
RUNNING AIR RAID COMBAT PROGRAM...
SAFETY MEASURES DISENGAGED.

MAIN CANNON: TARGET ACQUIRED...
OPEN FIRE.
RUNNING EXTERMINATION PROGRAM...

I have claimed the girl in the picture!
She's mine! You can't have her!

Can you hear me?
<Italic>1</Italic>Do not<Italic>0</Italic> attack the painting of the goddess.
Just...trust me on this.

What did I tell you!?
No attacking the picture of the pretty lady!

How long since I've possessed such a masterpiece...
No one─NO ONE─will get in my way!

Paintings are my world─the wellspring of my strength!
Shall I treat you to an exhibition!?

Ah, a portrayal of fire...
Revel in its fiery magnificence as your bodies turn to ash!

Next up, a portrayal of water.
Can you feel its inexorable pull, dragging you to your doom?

Behold, a portrayal of wind.
How helpless you are before its ferocious gale!

This portrayal of earth depicts the fury of the land.
...Is that the ground beginning to tremble?

An artist's brush can capture reality in a picture.
Shall we see what happens when I release it?

Spirits, lost and wandering...
Feed upon the souls of these heretical fools!

Your struggles are in vain.
Accept your fate, and fall into death's embrace!
All is without hope...

Destroy! Destroy! Destroy!
I will destroy it all!

Poke a god and pay the price!
I'll bury you in tombs of ice!

Oho, you've figured out my tells, have you?
...Or have you?

His posture... The change is slight, but it's shifted somehow.
Keep an eye out for tricks!

Quick, now! Make your peace with death!
Because I'm making your death with all these pieces!
Blow them all away! Whoosh!

Did you think you'd won?
Oh no no no, we've just begun!

Scorch just half for twice the fun!
Run, run, or you'll be well done!
Am I here? Or over there!? I really could be ANYWHERE!

Look lively, now!
Ugh, must I give you a <Italic>1</Italic>push<Italic>0</Italic>?

Still alive? Unbelieeevable!
I really must insist you die!
Are you looking? Why are you looking? YOU SHOULDN'T BE LOOKING!

Are you afraid of the dark? Hah!
'Tis light's glare that will strip you bare!
The power... The absolute power...

Gahahaha!
UNLEASH IT ALL!
Yes... I am filled with glorious purpose!

Life... Dreams... Hope...
Where do they come from, and where do they go?
Such things as those...are mine to destroy!

He's gone beyond chaos...
The end approaches!

Your doom is nigh!
My empire of death will not be denied!

Destroy... Destroy... Destroy...
Only utter ruin will suffice...
That light! The data suggests extraordinary purification properties!

We've detected significant spectral activity!
Find a way to banish them!
Arrive at the Heart of the Dragon
